review: Very good experience, doctor explained the issue after diagnosing with proper care. Overall I recommend Dr. Naveen for any dental related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ********* ********* ** *** who will guide us with whats necessary and guide us after the treatment with repeated consultation and monitoring
Dr Naveen did a thorough check up and was listening to my problems. Then he explained to me the problem and the next steps to fix those problems. Happy to recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Was a very reassuring experience. I spent a few years feeling helpless about my dental concerns but now I believe I am in the right hands. While Dr Naveen's medical skills are a given, it is his soft skills that set him apart.  He is very polite and attentive to your concerns. I Highly Recommend him not just to patients with dental concerns, but to anyone training to be a dentist, so they can learn a holistic/patient-centric approach to Dental Practice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Vignesh for Dental Treatment after visiting two three dentists.. I found this through practo. I'm fully satisfied with their service n hospitality... Doctors are very friendly n make you feel comfortable once you visit there.. I was nervous n afraid about dental treatment. Dr naveen are highly knowledgeable n they know what best for patient. Been blessed to have such doctors around us.. I highly recommend this clinic for all dental problems.. They are the best in everything not just treating your dental problem but also they take care of you in all aspects. They are very professional n highly recommended..

review: I had one of my tooth chipped in Sweden, previous consultations in Sweden were adamant that the tooth needs to be removed and the root canal to be done for the other two adjacent teeth. After flying back to India and consulting Dr Naveen, all my teeth were saved as well and  got perfect looking crowns and with absolutely no pain.
